author: George Orwell
quote: War is peace. Freedom is slavery. Ignorance is strength.
description: A dystopian masterpiece about totalitarian control and surveillance.

title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
quote: And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it.
description: A magical story of Santiago, an Andalusian shepherd boy who yearns to travel in search of a worldly treasure.

title: The Universe in a Nutshell
author: Stephen Hawking
description: A guide to the universe's most important theories, from quantum mechanics to M-theory, presented with Hawking's signature clarity.

title: Pet Sematary
author: Stephen King
description: A chilling tale of a cursed burial ground that brings the dead back to life with terrifying consequences.

title: Brief Answers to the Big Questions
author: Stephen Hawking
quote: We are just an advanced breed of monkeys on a minor planet of a very average star. But we can understand the universe.
description: Hawking's final thoughts on the biggest questions: Is there a God? Can we predict the future? Is time travel possible?

title: Thinking, Fast and Slow
author: Daniel Kahneman
quote: Nothing in life is as important as you think it is while you are thinking about it.
description: A groundbreaking tour of the mind that explains the two systems that drive the way we think and make choices.

title: It
author: Stephen King
description: A group of kids face their fears when a shape-shifting entity emerges from the sewer every 27 years to prey on the town's children.
